column4: Former Microsoft CEO Ballmer does about-face on Linux technology
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Fifteen years after calling the open-source operating system Linux a "cancer " former Microsoft Corp  Chief Executive Steve Ballmer has softened his position.

column4: Former Microsoft CEO Ballmer does about-face on Linux technology
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  March 10 Fifteen years after calling the open-source operating system Linux a "cancer " former Microsoft Corp Chief Executive Steve Ballmer has softened his position.
